Package com.nbkelly

Class BooleanCommand

java.lang.Object
com.nbkelly.Command
com.nbkelly.BooleanCommand
public class BooleanCommand
extends Command
Extention of command to set boolean values

A command interprets arguments arrays into variables. It is capable of self-matching on an argument array, updating the given input, and recognizing errors or duplicate inputs.

The BooleanCommand version allows for the recognition of Boolean variables through a set-once interface

Since:
1.0

    boolean value

      public int match​(String[] argv, int index)
      Description copied from class: Command
      Given a list of arguments, and an index, attempts to match the argument at this index.
      Specified by:
      match in class Command
      Parameters:
      argv - the input arguments for the program
      index - the current index of matching
      Returns:
      (new_index gt 0) if there was a match, 0 if there was no match, or -1 if there was an error
